name: Hyacinthus
detailed_description:
Hyacinthus is a 30-minute AVG game with a painting system.
Players help people in the city achieve their wishes through painting.

【story】
A long time ago, a teenager named Haisinsus (Hyacinth)
He is good at drawing and also likes to help others.
One day a bit of angel appeared in front of him.
I can give you magical painting skills.
What will change when you draw something?
But for your safety, you can't say that this is your own ability.
Say you have a magical painting
Sea Hinss promised to get down and got magical ability
He bought a set of painting tools to travel around the world.
And helped a lot of people with incredible ability

short_description: Hyacinthus is a 30-minute AVG game with a painting system. Players help people in the city achieve their wishes through painting.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows xp or later
  • Processor: any cpu 1GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
